Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Wooden Sifter^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

If you have stacks of loose grit like ^orange;silt^reset;, ^orange;Gravel^reset; or ^green;other powdery materials^reset; then just toss them in a ^orange;Sifter^reset; and you can pull resources right out of them! Build a ^orange;Sifter^reset; now.
Wooden sifters are terribly inefficient and slow, so as soon as you can I advice upgrading to a ^orange;Powder Sifter^reset; at an Electronics Center.
